source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SOURCE_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TARGET_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] 
FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SIL' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SIL - TQM 01'

activities.name: SEND ERROR MESSAGE LOOKUP SRC LIST

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SOURCE_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TARGET_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] 
FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SIL' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SIL - TQM 02'

activities.name: SEND ERROR MESSAGE LOOKUP SRC LIST

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [JOB_SCRIPT] AS [SRC_LIST], [SOURCE_TABLE] AS [SRC_TBL], [TARGET_TABLE] AS [TGT_TBL] 
FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SIL' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SIL - TQM'

activities.name: SEND ERROR MESSAGE LOOKUP SRC LIST

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select case when FULL_LOAD_FLG ='N' then JOB_SCRIPT +' and '+INCREMENTAL_COL +'>= dateadd(day,-'+convert(varchar(2),PRUNE_DAYS)+',getdate())' else JOB_SCRIPT end as SRC_LIST, [SOURCE_SCHEMA] as SRC_SCHEMA,[SOURCE_TABLE] as SRC_TBL,  [TARGET_TABLE] as TGT_TBL 
from [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE ACTIVE_FLG ='Y' and JOB_GROUP ='SDE' and JOB_SUB_GROUP ='SDE - ASA 01'

activities.name: SEND ERROR MESSAGE LOOKUP SRC LIST
